translation.en: Is that you on the beach?
No, no. That's my... That's my mom.
Yeah. She came to this beach when she found out she was pregnant with me.
translation.ja: 妊娠して ここへ来たの お腹にいたのが私

translation.en: I've never been, but... it's kind of our beach.
translation.ja: 妊娠して ここへ来たの お腹にいたのが私 ２人のビーチよ

translation.en: You want to see more photos? I can...

translation.ja: そうね　ありがとう

translation.en: My friend. You know, mi amiga. You know, the girl we left back at the hotel?
translation.ja: 私の友達よ ホテルに置いてきた子

translation.en: You know, she smelled like Don Julio... and bad choices?
translation.ja: テキーラ飲んで 悪ノリしたのよ

translation.en: She always does this to me, too. She just... she just disappears.
translation.ja: いつも急に消えるの まるで…

translation.en: She's like the fantasmo, no? You know, you know fantasmo?
translation.ja: スペイン語で幽霊は “ファンタズモ”？

translation.en: - Fantasma, con A. - Sí, con A.
The whole reason I planned to come on this trip, con A, was to find the secret beach.
translation.ja: 秘密のビーチを捜しに わざわざ来たのに―

translation.en: And now she's just stuck back at Las Rocas with the Irish flu.
translation.ja: 飲みすぎて ホテルに こもってる
〈完全にダウンよ 彼女は いつもそう〉

translation.en: You don't like it when someone change your plans, do you?
translation.ja: 計画を変えられたくない？

translation.en: No, I don't. No, I don't. It's just, you know. It's not fair.
translation.ja: 絶対にイヤよ そういうの嫌いなの

translation.en: You know why, though? It's because I'm reliable. You know reliable?
translation.ja: 私は信頼を裏切らない 分かる？
〈偉そうだ〉 そうよ　それが私なの
そうよ　それが私なの

translation.en: Hey... what is this beach called?
translation.ja: “アンナ：あとで話そう 秘密のビーチの名前は？” ビーチの名前は？

translation.en: You're not gonna tell me. Cool.
Not possible. It's too hot here.
translation.ja: まさか　ものすごく暑い

translation.en: No, no, you're cool. You're being cool. Never mind, that's good.
translation.ja: 態度がクールなのよ もういいわ

translation.en: This is the island of the pregnant woman... No?
translation.ja: 〈あの島は 妊娠してる女の人でしょ？〉

translation.en: The nose... the breasts... and her stomach.
translation.ja: 〈あれが鼻で 胸があって お腹が出てる〉

translation.en: - No, no, no. Por favor. - No, please.
No, we were going the same way. I live close by, so... don't worry.
translation.ja: 方角が同じだった うちは すぐそこ

translation.en: - Carlos. Charlie. - Nice to meet you, Charlie.
translation.ja: カルロスだ 助かったわ

translation.en: Nice to meet you. You know, have, high school.
translation.ja: ごめんね　スペイン語は 高校で習っただけ

translation.en: I mean, I was in medical school, but we didn't have Spanish there,
translation.ja: 医学校に通ってたの スペイン語より解剖が得意… 黙るわ

translation.en: just cadavers. I'll shut up now.
translation.ja: スペイン語より解剖が得意… 黙るわ

translation.en: Okay, dark in a few hours, so...
And... how you getting out from here?
translation.ja: ここから どうやって帰る？

translation.en: Never mind. Thank you, Carlos. Thank you again for taking me here.
translation.ja: 今の忘れて とにかく感謝してる

translation.en: - It means a lot to me. - Okay.
translation.ja: ありがとう じゃあ

translation.en: What did you say the name of it was again, though? I just forgot for some reason.
translation.ja: ビーチの名前 何だっけ？ 度忘れした

translation.en: He say that it is hard to paddle against the current.
translation.ja: 波を抜けるのはキツい

translation.en: Yeah, I wasn't expecting that. I almost got caught on the inside coming out.
translation.ja: 本当ね 沖まで行けないかと思った
〈そうよ　私はアメリカ人〉
惜しい　テキサスよ

translation.en: Yes, we have surf in Texas. It's just not like this, though.
translation.ja: ここほど いい波は立たないけど

translation.en: Hey, this is a secret break. How you find it?
translation.ja: 秘密のポイントだ なぜ ここへ？

translation.en: Someone told me about it a while ago. What's it called?
translation.ja: ある人に聞いたの ビーチの名前は？

translation.en: If I tell you, I would have to kill you!
Well, that would ruin my day.
Anything gnarly out here I should know about?
There's only one tide a day, and when the tide gets low, it becomes an island.
translation.ja: 日に１回 潮が引くと海面に出てくる

translation.en: There's some nasty fire coral. It stings like a jellyfish.
translation.ja: 火傷(ヤケド)サンゴにも注意しろ クラゲみたいに刺すぞ
〈あとで一緒に飲もう ヘッドカメラの動画を見せる〉

translation.en: Still have no idea what you're saying.
He's saying that you should come over here. The wave breaks better.
translation.ja: “こっちへ来い もっといい波が立つ”って

translation.en: I'm okay, I'm okay. I'm cool here, thank you.
translation.ja: ここで十分よ　ありがとう

translation.en: It's rough out here for a little girl from Texas.
translation.ja: テキサス娘には ハードな波だぜ

translation.en: I think I'll be all right.

translation.ja: 私は どこだ？ ティファナ？

translation.en: Oh, my God. No way. Mom's beach, right?
translation.ja: ウソでしょ　ママのビーチ？

translation.en: It's just as beautiful as she said it was.
I wish you were here. I wish she was here.
translation.ja: あなたがいたらね そしてママも

translation.en: Well, I wasn't gonna come all this way just to wuss out because I lost my plus- one.
translation.ja: 相棒が来なくても メゲてないから

translation.en: That's how you wind up on Nancy Grace, okay?
translation.ja: そうやって事件は起きる

translation.en: Excuse me. I am supposed to be the boring, overprotective sister. You are supposed to be the fun one.
translation.ja: いつもは私が過保護で あなたがハジけてる

translation.en: Sis, the surf here, it's insane. You would not believe the perfect tube I just caught.
translation.ja: ここの波は最高よ すごいチューブをキメたわ

translation.en: I could shoot tubes just as good as you, if you would just take me out!
translation.ja: 連れてってくれたら 私もキメられる

translation.en: I'll take you. I'll take you out as soon as I get back.
translation.ja: 戻ったら一緒にやろうね

translation.en: - I love you, too, Short Crop. - Is that Nancy?
translation.ja: 私もよ ナンシーか？

translation.en: - It's Dad. - Just tell him it's all fine, okay?
- Love you. Bye. - No, it's, it's a friend.

translation.ja: 代わりなさい　クロエ
ナンシー　今 どこにいる？

translation.en: I don't know what to say, Nance. I'm at a loss.
- I don't-- I don't-- I can't understand-- - I don't expect you to.
translation.ja: 理解できん… でしょうね

translation.en: I don't know. What do you... What do you want me to say?
Well, say you're coming back. Say you're not dropping out of med school after all this time, after all this work.
translation.ja: “ちゃんと帰ってくる 医学校を中退しない”

translation.en: - You know, just don't quit. - Okay, Dad.
That's enough. Can we just not do this right now, please?
It's what you love. You help people.
Well, not everyone can be helped, Dad. You... You know that.
translation.ja: 救えない病人もいるわ

translation.en: What else would it be about?
If you want to make this about her, then you stay in it.
translation.ja: ママのためにも医者になれ

translation.en: It's just she fought too hard, Dad.
translation.ja: ママは全力で闘ったわ

translation.en: I gotta go, okay? I'll see you soon.
Yeah, girl, it's getting late. Let's go in.
translation.ja: 日が暮れるぞ　上がろう

translation.en: I'm gonna catch one last one. Thanks.
- Nice meeting you guys. - See you later, guera.

translation.ja: 行かないで　助けて！
こっちを見て　助けて！

translation.en: No, no, no. Where are you taking me?
You're not gonna feel a thing, ma'am.
I just put some Novocain injections to... numb the area, so...
translation.ja: 局所麻酔よ 注射すれば何も感じない

translation.en: you're just gonna feel a little pressure, but...
translation.ja: 押された感じがするけど―

translation.en: you're not gonna feel the stitches, okay?
translation.ja: 縫われてる感覚はない

translation.en: Yeah. That's a nice... That's a nice union.
One more, and then we'll send you on your way.
Just keep it elevated, ma'am. Someone's coming.
translation.ja: 脚を上げてて すぐに誰か来るわ

translation.en: Okay, okay. You're gonna be fine.
translation.ja: 安心して もう大丈夫

translation.en: Now let's loosen this tourniquet for you.
Okay, you get two minutes of blood flow.

translation.ja: バックパックよ そっちにある
そうよ そっちにあるでしょ
ダメ　そうじゃない

translation.en: Come back, you can have it! You can have it! Come back!
translation.ja: 何でもあげるから 私を見捨てないで
行かないで　お願い

translation.en: Wait! It's okay! Just don't go!
translation.ja: 待って　海に入らないで

translation.en: Stop! Get out of the water!
translation.ja: やめて　海から出て！

translation.en: Don't worry about it! There's no sharks here!
translation.ja: 大丈夫　ここにサメはいない

translation.en: Come on! Come on! Come on, come on! Swim!
translation.ja: 急いで　もっと速くよ！

translation.en: Come on! Come on, come on, swim!
I got you! Come on! Come on! Come on!
translation.ja: 急いで　ここまで来て
つかまって　大丈夫

translation.en: You're okay. I'm helping you, little buddy.
translation.ja: 大丈夫　治してあげる

translation.en: I'm not very good at ortho, but it just looks like a dislocation.
translation.ja: 整復は得意じゃないけど 脱臼みたいね

translation.en: I'm just gonna do this quick, okay?
It's gonna hurt just for a second, and then you're gonna be okay.
translation.ja: 痛いのは一瞬だけ すぐによくなるわ

translation.en: That's a terrible way to say thank you.
Thirty- two seconds from the whale to the rock.
translation.ja: クジラから ここまで32秒

translation.en: Come on, I got you! I got you!
I got you! I got you!
This is Nancy Adams. It's April 26, 2016.
translation.ja: 私はナンシー･アダムス 2016年４月26日

translation.en: If you find this, please send help right away. I've been attacked by a shark.
translation.ja: サメに襲われたの 助けを呼んで

translation.en: He's killed three other people since I got here. He's still circling, so...
translation.ja: ３人殺されたわ サメは旋回してる

translation.en: He's got this big old whale over here, but that-- That's the problem. I swam right up onto his feeding ground.
translation.ja: クジラを仕留めたところに 出くわしたみたい

translation.en: I've been bitten pretty deeply into my... my gastroc and quad muscles.
translation.ja: 腓腹(ひふく)筋と大腿(だいたい)四頭筋を 深く噛まれた

translation.en: I have a deep gash running vertically down my medial thigh,
translation.ja: 大腿部の中央から 垂直に裂けて―

translation.en: and then it turns lateral, just above my knee.
translation.ja: ヒザ上で横に開いてる

translation.en: And right here, there's one going across my, my posterior calf.
translation.ja: それから ふくらはぎにも裂傷が

translation.en: I'm losing a lot of blood. Gangrene is setting in.
translation.ja: 大量の出血 壊疽(えそ)が起きてるわ

translation.en: I feel like I'm losing my strength. I don't think I have much time.
translation.ja: 体力も落ちてる どのくらいもつか

translation.en: The island I'm on is gonna be taken by the tide in a few minutes.
translation.ja: 私のいる岩礁は 数分後に満潮で水没するの

translation.en: I'm about 200 yards off the shore. On this beach.
translation.ja: ここはビーチから 200ｍ足らず

translation.en: I never found out what it was called.
translation.ja: ビーチの名前は知らない

translation.en: There's a buoy, which I'm gonna try to swim to,
translation.ja: あのブイまで泳ぐつもり

translation.en: If you find this, can you just...
Can you just delete that first part and...
translation.ja: 冒頭の部分を消去して ここに送ってほしいの

translation.en: And send it to 10231 Oliver Crescent Drive,
translation.ja: 冒頭の部分を消去して ここに送ってほしいの テキサス州　ガルベストン オリバークレセント通り

translation.en: That's my home. That's where my... That's where my dad and sister live.
translation.ja: 私の家よ 父と妹が住んでる

translation.en: I finally got that alone time.
I mean, I'm not totally alone. I got this little dude, Steven Seagull here, keeping me company.
translation.ja: 本当は１人じゃないわ カモメが友達になってくれた

translation.en: Show 'em your wing. I fixed him for you, Chlo.
translation.ja: 翼を見せて 私が治してあげたの

translation.en: I just don't want you guys to worry, and I don't want you to feel...
translation.ja: パパたちに 心配かけたくなかった

translation.en: you know, bad or anything, 'cause... I love you so much,
translation.ja: 悪いのは私なの 心から愛してるわ

translation.en: and I miss you more than I ever... I ever even realized I could.
translation.ja: 胸が張り裂けるほど パパたちに会いたい

translation.en: Dad, I gotta get off this rock soon,
but I want you to know I'm gonna fight.
I am. Just like she taught us.
translation.ja: ママが全力で闘ったように…

translation.en: It's okay. It's okay. You got it. Good job.
translation.ja: ここに乗って　そうよ

translation.en: You didn't like that, 'cause it stings like jellyfish.
translation.ja: 刺されるのをイヤがってた

translation.en: This is Nancy Adams. It's April 26, 2016.
translation.ja: 私はナンシー･アダムス 2016年４月26日

translation.en: If you find this, please send help right away. I've been attacked by a shark.
translation.ja: サメに襲われたの 助けを呼んで

translation.en: He's killed three other people since I got here.
I'm losing a lot of blood. I feel like I'm losing my strength.
translation.ja: 大量の出血 体力も落ちてる

translation.en: I love you more, Short Crop. I'll be home soon.
translation.ja: 大好きよ　クロエ すぐ帰るから
ウソでしょ　ママのビーチ？

translation.en: I don't want you to feel, you know, bad or anything.
I gotta go, Dad. I'll see you later.
- Hey, sweet pea. ...she was a fighter. - I could shoot tubes...
translation.ja: ナンシー　ママは闘った

translation.en: I'm gonna fight, just like she taught us.
Ready to get wet, Dr. Adams?
Ma would be proud of you. Both of you.

translation.ja: ありがとう 行くわよ

translation.en: Do you think I'll ever be as good as you?
